General.Name: Bank of Beijing Co Ltd
General.Description: Bank of Beijing Co., Ltd. provides various banking services to personal and corporate customers in China. The company accepts foreign exchange and corporate current deposits. It also offers personal housing, Jing e, personal consumption, individual operation, working capital, fixed asset, RMB syndicated, foreign related syndicated, and M and A loans; and outbound finance, safe deposit box, investment, and financing services. In addition, the company provides account settlement, down payment, cash management, trade finance, cross border remittance, foreign exchange settlement and derivates, international settlement, financing and loans for international trade, international guarantee, and FTN account and foreign exchange services. Further, it offers financial consulting, credit mitigation risk warrant, and publicly offered REITs, as well as debt financing instruments, financial bonds, debt financing plan, and direct financing tool underwriting services. Additionally, the company provides financial market trading, asset custody, credit card, and integrated financial services; and finance solutions for social security, medical treatment, and education. Bank of Beijing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
